caption: Unfortunately the high priced experience has not been positive a positive one. Besides waiting 10 minutes for the cook to arrive with clean pots to make the meal I ordered and the time of preparation, the meals were prepared extremely poorly. Upon payment the cashier charged me a total of $43 by card; $13+ over. My order was for $26.00. One meal being $18 (Camarofongo/ Shrimp Monfongo) and a cuban sandwich for $8. She stated $6 was for tax And an additional $1 per meal. Once I physically wrote what she explained she noticed she was still $10 over which then gave me a ten dollar bill.  I explained to her that she was still over charging me because tax is not over 10% of any purchase.  She looked at me puzzled as I wrote it out and explained it again.  She did nothing. I left with my food,  a $43 charge to my card and a $10 bill for change.  Upon arriving home I open my meal and it is missing the gravy, half of the plate is salad and there are 5 pieces of shrimp in total. Place is a complete rip off.  Sadly we are facing a pandemic where it is impacting us in a financial level yet patrons of the near neighborhoods are taking customers forgranted. Prior to this review I attempted to call the store and ask about my meal and see if there was a way to resolve the matter but the woman said that's how it's made.  I related that I'd be giving a detailed review/ complaint and she stated that the business doesn't have any page or uber rates or anything online of the sort so it wouldn't matter. Regrettably I must say that the professionalism is at a poor rate along with the service in general.

(Translated by Google) Expensive, expensive, expensive. Better walk a little further down to the train station. And they find several better places to eat and fast food.  (Original) Caro, caro, caro. Mejor camine un poco más abajo, hasta la estación del tren. Y encuentran varios lugares mejores para comer y  fast food.
Wow, I absolutely love the food from here! Such good service & amazing taste! Definitely recommend
